imSAFE App Terms and Conditions

 Welcome to the imSAFE mobile application ("App"). The following terms and conditions ("Terms") govern your use of the App. By downloading, installing, or using the App, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you do not agree with any part of these Terms, you may not use the App.

 1. Acceptance of Terms
 By using the imSAFE App, you agree to comply with these Terms and any additional terms and conditions that may apply to specific features or services within the App.

 2. Use of the App
 The imSAFE App is designed to provide users with access to emergency services, reporting tools, and alerts during emergencies. Users must use the App responsibly and in compliance with all applicable laws and regulations.

 3. Emergency Situations
 The imSAFE App is intended to assist users in emergencies by providing access to relevant information and resources. However, it does not guarantee immediate assistance or emergency response. Users should contact local emergency services (e.g., police, fire department, medical services) when necessary.

 4. User Responsibilities
 Users are responsible for providing accurate information when using the imSAFE App, including their location, contact details, and descriptions of emergency situations. Users must also ensure the security of their login credentials and report any unauthorized access to their account.

 5. Privacy Policy
 We are committed to protecting your privacy. Our Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and disclose your personal information when you use the imSAFE App. By using the App, you consent to the collection and use of your information as described in our Privacy Policy.

 6. Security
 We employ industry-standard security measures to protect user data and prevent unauthorized access to the App. However, we cannot guarantee the security of user information and accept no liability for breaches of security beyond our control.

 7. Limitations of Liability
 To the fullest extent permitted by law, we disclaim any liability for damages or losses arising from the use of the imSAFE App, including but not limited to delays in emergency response, technical issues, or inaccuracies in information provided.

 8. Indemnification
 You agree to indemnify and hold harmless imSAFE and its affiliates, directors, officers, employees, and agents from any claims, damages, or liabilities arising from your use of the App or violation of these Terms.

 9. Updates and Modifications
 We reserve the right to update, modify, or discontinue the imSAFE App or its features at any time without prior notice. We may also change these Terms from time to time, and your continued use of the App constitutes acceptance of any such changes.

 10. Feedback and Support
 We welcome your feedback on the imSAFE App and encourage you to report any issues or concerns to our support team. You can contact us at [contact email/phone number].

 11. Governing Law
 These Terms are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of [jurisdiction]. Any disputes relating to these Terms or the imSAFE App shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts in [jurisdiction].

 12. Changes to Terms
 We reserve the right to change or update these Terms at any time. We will notify users of any material changes to these Terms, and such changes will take effect immediately upon posting on this page.

 13. Termination
 We reserve the right to terminate or suspend your access to the imSAFE App at any time and for any reason, including violation of these Terms or misuse of the App.

 14. Severability
 If any provision of these Terms is found to be invalid or unenforceable, the remaining provisions shall remain in full force and effect.

 15. Entire Agreement
 These Terms constitute the entire agreement between you and imSAFE regarding the use of the App, superseding any prior agreements or understandings.

 By using the imSAFE App, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agreed to these Terms. If you have any questions or concerns about these Terms, please contact us at [johannalvares2003@gmail.com]
